author: Mohammad Ali
text:
A local court in Meerut on Saturday accepted a plea by Hindu Mahasabha against Salman Khan and Shahrukh Khan for allegedly going to a temple with their shoes on, as seen in a television promo of a reality show on a private entertainment channel. The court fixed January 18 as the next date of hearing.

“The entertainment channel shows Shahrukh Khan and Salman Khan inside a Kali temple in the sheets of the reality show Big Boss which was broadcast last December. This offends my sentiments as a Hindu. So I approached the court,” said Bharat Rajput, president of the Meerut unit of Hindu Mahasabha.
title: Plea against Salman, SRK for wearing shoes in temple
